secret_rule: Pairs of items can be brought to the picnic if they are both objects typically found in a school.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "pencil" and "notebook" and "ruler" and "eraser".

Correct! The rule is: Pairs of items can be brought to the picnic if they are both objects typically found in a school.
